dip.gui.map

Class ViewControlBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JToolBar
            • dip.gui.map.ControlBar
              • dip.gui.map.ViewControlBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DOMUIEventHandler, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditControlBar, OrderControlBar

    public class ViewControlBar
extends ControlBar
    View Control Bar

    This is the control bar that implements basic zooming and revert capability.

    Typically, it is used when not in edit mode, and when no orders can be entered.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
